snippet.title: Man charged over Melbourne house death
snippet.content: A murder-accused man has faced court in Melbourne after a death in suburbia. Hung Anh Vu, 45, from Sunshine West appeared briefly in Melbourne Magistrates' Court on Monday following the weekend death of 44-year-old Hung Viet Nguyen. Mr Nguyen died just after 8.30pm on Saturday at a house at Sunshine West. A 42-year-old woman who was present in the house was taken to hospital with non-life threatening injuries. Vu was remanded to reappear before the court on January 8 for a committal mention. (C) AAP 2017
